about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.title: About Me
about.text: Hey there, I'm Pascal! Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
about.info1: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site and remotely.
about.info2: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about.info3: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code – it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.subtitle: Technologies
skills.title: Skill Set
skills.text: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
skills.questionText: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.subtitle: Portfolio
projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

references.headline: What my colleagues say about me

Burdick.text: Pascal has proven to be a reliable and committed team member. His strong technical knowledge and problem-solving mindset contributed greatly to our project success.
Burdick.author: M. Burdick – Team Partner

Marrocu.text: Working with Pascal was a great experience. He consistently demonstrated responsibility, technical expertise, and a proactive attitude throughout the project.
Marrocu.author: M. Marrocu – Team Partner

Heim.text: Pascal played a key role in our team success. His ability to take initiative and deliver high quality work made a strong positive impact on our results.
Heim.author: S. Heim – Team Partner

Gilles.text: Pascal showed excellent collaboration and technical competence. His dedication and clear communication helped the team stay organized and efficient.
Gilles.author: S. Gilles – Team Partner

Cecilia.text: It was a pleasure working with Pascal. He is reliable, detail oriented, and always willing to support others to ensure the project runs smoothly.
Cecilia.author: Cecilia – Team Partner

Rangosch.text: Pascal contributed significantly to our project through his technical strength and solution oriented thinking. His reliability and teamwork were highly appreciated.
Rangosch.author: C. Rangosch – Trusted Reference
